EmailTemplate.name: CS_template
EmailTemplate.subject: [Your Company/Project Name] - [Brief Description] {!Case.SuppliedEmail}
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear [Recipient's Name], I hope this email finds you well. I wanted to bring your attention to [specific topic or purpose of the email]. In light of recent developments, we are [taking a particular action, providing information, requesting feedback, etc.]. [Include any relevant details, key points, or necessary information.] We appreciate your [cooperation/feedback/attention] on this matter. If you have any questions or require further clarification, please feel free to reach out. Thank you for your time and cooperation. Best regards, [Your Full Name] [Your Position] [Your Company] [Contact Information]
